entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
